name: The KEE productivity system
description: There's a new productivity framework in townThis Notion template includes the fundamental architecture and engines for the KEE productivity system:The 3 core databases: Knowledge, Energy and Engines. 6 preconfigured essential Engines, including dashboards and instructions. 7 add-on engines. Ready to be activated5 offline routines and habits.Comprehensive quick start & advanced expansion guidesIf you'd like to learn more about the benefit of the KEE Framework, and what's behind it, read this
